name: Edge Of Collapse
description:
This is a game I created as part of a project at university.

The game is a simple, 2D, endless side-scroller where the player, by tapping the screen (or clicking the mouse) avoids objects hurling towards them. 

"Normal Mode" and "Mirror Mode" are both set in deep space, where the player is a UFO/Spaceship avoiding asteroids

"Mad Mode" is a little bit different visually, but the gameplay is the same.

*NOTE* "Mirror Mode" doesn't work at the moment as the game is still in development, but "Normal Mode" and "Mad Mode" are ready to play!

I hope you enjoy!
